attributes.action: recommend the individual who leaked details of MP's expenses claims to the press, if and when identified, for a seat in the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The House of Commons has asked the Police to identify the person who leaked details of MP's expenses claims to the Daily Telegraph. If this is with a view to punishment, it highlights the gap which has opened between the values of the governing and those of the governed in our limited form of democracy.

The whistleblower has clearly performed a major public service and, accordingly, should be rewarded by elevation to the House of Lords.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
